title: I’m no professional but I’ve been thinking of maybe starting an Indian Pop band maybe in the future, something which is in standards of K-pop. Any advice on how I could work it out? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey. I’ve been having similar thoughts lately. We could start on youtube by covering songs and then work our way to get recognized. And what do you mean by standards of k pop?If you’re still interested and want to talk more dm me iiiilhamm in instagram
That won’t work. You can’t just “create” a new type of music, especially if it’s just going to be copying Kpop or another genre.
